title: Hrant, this is for you.
content:
FYI: Armenian book pages [Bijzondere Collecties UvA] on Flickr may be known by others already but if not:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/bijzonderecollectiesuva/sets/72157629968007...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414153708/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/bijzonderecollectiesuva/sets/72157629968007414/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/bijzonderecollectiesuva/sets/72157629968007414/")
author: dezcom

comments.content:
Since I can't seem to be able to edit my typo above, please note that the third word is meant to be "is" rather than just "s"

my bad

Doesn’t make sense.

The 3rd word is actually “pages.” “Book” if you count FYI.

Copy/paste your comment, highlight what the wrong word is, and on a new line say what you want it to be edited to.
He's referring to the title of the thread.
Aw, and here I thought he was talking about the letter Տ.

Thanks Chris - I hadn't seen that! Great stuff.

There should be enough time to add a link to that Flickr set in my review of Lane's book in Codex #3.

hhp

Mine? No, the link Lozos shows (probably as a TinyURL).

hhp
The link is to Bijzondere Collecties UvA, not to me. I am just the messenger :-)
